name: Create new Cloze projects from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new project in Cloze. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1wzqWuz3MI6H-nqM9ilS-o1PHfzRprLguSqGjdmNdGwg/edit?usp=sharing).
